Title: The Axeman Cometh
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Douglas Petrie
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Taissa Farmiga, Frances Conroy, Evan Peters
Plot: When Zoe, Queenie and Nan use a ouija board to find out what happened to Madison, they awaken the spirit of a long-dead serial killer, the Axeman.
